verses.name: Revelation 2:1
verses.text: Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;

verses.name: Revelation 2:2
verses.text: I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:

verses.name: Revelation 2:3
verses.text: And hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name’s sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.

verses.name: Revelation 2:4
verses.text: Nevertheless I have somewhat against thee, because thou hast left thy first love.
